name: Couple of Bones
description:
Help Mandy Bow and Davey Bones retrieve their lost bones. Two lovers tied by the red string of fate, they must use the power of love to overcome obstacles. Perform amazing acrobatic feats by tugging or boosting your partner. But be careful! With the power to tug at each other's heartstrings, mutual understanding is required. However, communication can be difficult when you're flying across the sky (or a skeleton with no jaw)! Solidarity is key! Play alone (swapping between Mandy and Davey) or with a friend (recommended)!

Controls Keyboard P1

A/D: Move
W: Jump
S: Boost [Hold]
Q: Tug
Space: Grab Vine Hook [Hold]
TAB: Swap

P2

K/[;]: Move
O: Jump
L: Boost [Hold]
I: Tug
[?]: Grab Vine Hook [Hold]

ESC: Pause

Controller [Xbox] (P1 and P2 with two controllers)

Left Analog: Move
A: Jump
Y: Boost [Hold]
X: Tug
RB: Grab [Hold]
LB: Swap
Start: Pause

Tips
  • In single player, characters remember commands when held while swapping
  • The further away the characters, the stronger the tug!
  • Use Boost to become a launch pad for your partner!
  • Gravestones are checkpoints, make sure to grab them
